title: Mailboxing
description: A shipping service in Bermuda offering the largest and fastest services. Integrated with APIs like WhatsApp, Mailgun, and Bermuda Customs.
responsibilities: Enhanced and extended existing modules with new features to improve functionality.
Developed and implemented responsive, user-centric interface designs.
Optimized database queries and refactored code for improved performance and maintainability across existing modules.
Upgraded Angular framework from version 8 to 16, ensuring compatibility and leveraging modern features.
Upgraded Laravel framework from version 8 to 10, maintaining seamless functionality and adhering to the latest development standards.

title: Fyfer App
description: A fitness app integrating real-time virtual training and health tracking.
responsibilities: Designed and optimized database architecture to ensure scalability and efficiency.
Architected and developed the entire backend API to support application functionalities.
Engineered RESTful APIs to support core features such as likes, comments, mentions, and user activity feeds.
Implemented real-time video communication using Twilio APIs and integrated Stripe for seamless and secure payment processing.
Developed a robust and user-friendly admin panel to manage users, projects, and payment workflows effectively.

Developed a robust and user-friendly admin panel to manage users, projects, and payment workflows effectively.
